__e: This has gone way beyond terrorism and you know it.
If I was to know something possibly terror-related and help you out, could I bank the resulting goodwill?
That money is going to fund terror all over the world. I'm not gonna let that happen for the sake of one woman.
What's insidious about terrorism is... it can get inside our heads, make us change the way we live our lives.
You think terrorism is the only threat to our American way of life?
The war on terrorism is the war on your freedom.
